sec.p: The plant contains toxins; the most important ones of them are tetrahydrocannabinol, cannabidiol, and cannabinol. This is why it belongs to the category of toxic plants of therapeutic interest.

During acute intoxication, the initial phase is characterized by a period of mild euphoria and well-being and then a period of mental confusion with hallucinations and hate attacks that can lead the addiction in the worst attacks. Deadly poisoning remains exceptional [ 25].
